name: MUSICXML File
summary: Learn about .MUSICXML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a MUSICXML file with various music notation applications, including MuseScore, MakeMusic Finale, and Avid Sibelius. For example, to open a MUSICXML file with MuseScore, select File â†’ Open....

Since MUSICXML files are saved in plain text, you can also open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or a source code editor. You may need to rename the .musicxml file extension to .txt for the text editor to recognize it.

When opened in a text editor or source code editor, you can modify the properties of the MUSICXML file. However, if you incorrectly edit the file, you may not be able to open the file correctly with an application that natively supports it.
Several applications, including MuseScore, MakeMusic Finale, and Myriad Melody Assistant, can convert MUSICXML files to other formats.
For example, MuseScore can convert MUSICXML files to the following formats:
